fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Hydro options include: Yelan, Xingqiu, Furina, and Kamisato Ayato.
Electro options include: Raiden Shogun, Yae Miko, Beidou, Fischl, Kuki Shinobu, Ororon, Dori, and Lisa.
